thread.title: BRIEF-Godrej Consumer Products Dec Quarter Consol Net Profit Up 22 Pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Godrej Consumer Products Dec Quarter Consol Net Profit Up 22 Pct
text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Indiaâ€™s Godrej Consumer Products Ltd :
* DECLARED AN INTERIM DIVIDEND OF 1 RUPEE PER SHARE * DEC QUARTER CONSOL NET PROFIT 4.30 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS PROFIT OF 3.52 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* CONSENSUS FORECAST FOR DEC QUARTER CONSOL PROFIT WAS 4.12 BILLION RUPEES
* DEC QUARTER CONSOL TOTAL REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS 26.30 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 24.86 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR Source text - bit.ly/2GuHx9t Further company coverage:
